32:10 The original motivation was indeed for fertilizers, and the method was discovered before ww1 btw. The original goal was formulated as a method to make "Brot aus Luft" ("bread from air") as chemist in Germany called it by the time. That you can use it for explosives came later.

In Nepal too. But we are again taught that in the first semester for better understanding.

They are taught worldwide in highschool. But not every curriculum has the same focus and time spent on each respective topic, nor do highschool teachers always have the holistic understanding to teach students. So in first year of university, it is practical to review and reteach high school content in a complete manner to ensure everyone is up to date for second and third year.    There is nothing special about india.

This isn't a pure Chemistry course. If you take AP Chem in American highschool it is the same syllabus as ours and you can be exempted from classes like this when you reach college. I suppose this course is for those who didn't take AP.

@rajisuresh8769  A 5 on AP chemistry is not enough to get credit for this course. But its possible to test out of it at the beginning of semesters.  But yes the concepts in this lecture are taught in high school as well
